sense.gloss: gift given out by companies to customers as a token of gratitude, marketing incentive

sdata.j: |↑粗品|↑↓そしな↓ですがお↑受↑↓う↓け↑取↑↓と↓りください。
sdata.e: This is just a small gift, but please accept it.

sdata.j: ↑近所↑↓きんじょ↓に↑新規↑↓しんき↓オープンしたコンビニで↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓したらさ、|↑粗品|↑↓そしな↓で↑食↑↓しょく↓パンもらったんだ。
sdata.e: I went shopping at the new convenience store that opened in the neighborhood and received a free gift of bread.
